title: 2B/2B, Polished kitchen countertops, in Henderson NV
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '973', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Separate dining area', 'Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball', 'Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Mountain views', 'Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms', 'Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit', 'Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
